pageContext.claim: “No Palestinians or Israelis will be uprooted from their homes.”
pageContext.analysis: The plan contains a provision that would uproot Arabs from their country. It says that a cluster of 10 Arab towns north of Tel Aviv, known as “the Triangle,” would be subsumed by a future Palestinian state. "That was news to the Triangle’s 350,000 Arab residents, who say they were not consulted on what many say would amount to a forced deportation from Israel, where their families have lived for generations," The Washington Post reported.
